name: Impossibox
description:
Impossibox is a fun, easy going platformer, that will bring you to your knees!

Work your way through 50, sometimes seemingly impossible, levels and show the world what you are made of! Collect the coins to clear the level and watch the sun shine down on you as it counts your deaths with glee.

This game has all the platforming classics requiring steady hands and expert timing to complete. See if you have what it takes to conquer all 50 levels!
